Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
27 Sappaccayadukādi, Kusalattika
Sappaccayadukādi, Kusalattika
36.
101Sappaccayaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaccayo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ.
102Sappaccayaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naappaccayo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ.
103Sappaccayaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naappaccayo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ sappaccayasadisaṃ.)
